body: This card empowers the character drawing it with the one-time ability to call upon a source of wisdom to solve any single problem or answer fully any question upon her request. The query or request must be made within 1 year. Whether the information gained can be successfully acted upon is another matter entirely.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Artifacts/Minor Artifacts/Deck of Many Things/Description/Vizier
name: Vizier
